Of late, Sergio Marchionne is sounding increasingly optimistic about Chrysler as its fortunes improve, with U.S. sales rising 17 percent last year. I think our presence in Chrysler could not have been forecast, and certainly in hindsight it was probably one of the best things that could have happened to Fiat, he said last week in Italy. "I think it is also one of the best things that could have happened to Chrysler, too."

The management reshuffling appears to be amicable. Both Larry Page and Eric Schmidt had high praise for each other during a Thursday conference call with analysts, with Eric Schmidt describing Google's co-founders as his "best friends." I believe Larry Page is ready to be CEO, Eric Schmidt said during the call. "It's time for him to have a shot at running this." had a string of 355 passes without being intercepted, received 21 votes from a nationwide panel of 50 media members who regularly cover the league. missed out to the former` Blue Peter' presenter. However, insiders say Simon Cowell now wants a new face and thinks Georgie Thompson is ideal. A source told The News Of The World: The` Xtra Factor' job would be great for Georgie Thompson . She'll be fantastic. Konnie Huq , 35, was drafted in last year to replace Holly Willoughby but was said to have angered Simon Cowell by making a series of blunders which led to viewers to campaign on entertainment websites for her sacking.

"I am enormously proud of my last decade as CEO, and I am certain that the next 10 years under Larry Page will be even better!" Eric Schmidt wrote in Google's official blog post. Larry Page , in my clear opinion, is ready to lead. Eric Schmidt , a former Novell executive, has led the company since 2001.
